channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My wife and I moved to the U.S. 8 years ago. We have $45,000. Do we buy a house — or save our money for when we retire?
item.description: “We are all naturalized citizens. We have a small savings of over $45,000 deposited in a high-yield savings account.”

item.title: TD Nears Guilty Plea on Criminal Charges for U.S. Unit in Money-Laundering Probe
item.description: U.S. prosecutors have alleged that TD was reckless in failing to build and maintain systems that flagged and prevented money-laundering.

item.title: The number of millionaire college athletes has tripled. Here are the top 10 earners this year.
item.description: More college athletes are making over $1 million from NIL, and most of them play the same position in the same sport.

item.title: Stocks climb on week, with S&P 500 on pace for first September gain in 5 years
item.description: September is shaping up to be a solid month of gains for U.S. stocks, with the market bucking the seasonal trend after the Federal Reserve announced a...

item.title: Oil Price Expected to Weaken If OPEC+ Hikes Supply
item.description: Expectations that the OPEC and its allies will start unwinding voluntary output curbs of 2.2 million barrels a day starting from December is adding to...

item.title: The Score: Costco, Micron, EchoStar and More Stocks That Defined the Week
item.description: Here are some of the major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news.

item.title: A High-Profile Clean-Energy Startup Is Running Short on Cash
item.description: Monolith is struggling to meet production targets needed for $1 billion government loan.

item.title: The Fed Made Its Move. Why Didn't I?
item.description: In which our columnist investigates a financial pitfall called the ‘flypaper effect,’ only to find that he was trapped in it himself.

item.title: Paul Bilzerian avoided a $180 million fine for over 30 years. The SEC may have finally caught up.
item.description: The 1980s corporate raider claimed poverty for decades — but is now charged with hiding millions in a cannabis company purportedly run by his son, lif...

item.title: Rocket Lab’s stock soars as KeyBanc raises price target
item.description: Rocket Lab USA Inc. shares ended Friday’s session up 12.5%, boosted by KeyBanc Capital Markets’ price-target hike for the space-launch company.
